hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Left.item: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Did you know that Blue Fire destroys mud walls and detonates Bomb Flowers?

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #Epona's Song#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Game Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: No matter what happens...Do not give up, do not complain, and do NOT stay up all night playing!

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.
